decision_conditions: 1.	The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| 2.	The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawing title numbers: 0102 (Location plan) dated 08/03/2017, 0102 (Existing and proposed block plan) dated 08/03/2017, 022 (Proposed elvations) dated 08/03/2017, 023 (Proposed elevation B and C) dated 08/03/2017, 024 (Proposed sections) dated 08/03/2017, 014 (Existing elevations B and C) dated 08/03/2017, 013 (Existing elevation A) dated 08/03/2017, 015 (Existing section AA) dated 08/03/2017, 010 (Existing ground floor plan) dated 08/03/2017, 020 (Proposed ground floor plan) dated 08/03/2017, 012 (Existing roof plan) dated 08/03/2017, 021 (Proposed roof plan) dated 08/03/2017
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| 3.	All external materials to be used in the development shall match the existing building and be in accordance with the details indicated on the approved plans.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012.
